intro.name: intro
intro.title: Professional AI Image Detector
intro.description: Detect AI-generated images with confidence using our advanced machine learning technology. Our AI image detector analyzes visual patterns and artifacts to distinguish between human-created and artificially generated content.

items.title: Free AI Detection
items.description: Start using our AI image detector immediately with free credits included.

items.title: Enterprise Ready
items.description: Scale your AI detection needs with our robust API and enterprise solutions.

main.title: Upload Image for AI Detection
main.description: Simply upload your image below and our advanced detection system will analyze it for artificial generation patterns. Get instant results with detailed confidence scores and explanations.
main.tech_description: Our AI detection technology works by analyzing multiple layers of image data including pixel patterns, compression artifacts, and generation signatures that are characteristic of artificial intelligence tools like DALL-E, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion.
main.use_cases: Whether you're a content creator verifying authenticity, a journalist fact-checking images, or a business protecting brand integrity, our detection service provides the reliable analysis you need to identify AI-generated content with confidence.

uploads.drag_drop_text: Drag and drop your image here, or click to select
uploads.click_different_file: Click to select a different image

state.auth_required: Please sign in to use AI image detection. Redirecting to login page...

detectResult.insufficient_credits: Insufficient credits. You need at least 1 credit for detection. Please upgrade your plan.
detectResult.unable_verify_credits: Unable to verify credits. Please try again.
detectResult.ai_generated: AI Generated: This image appears to have been created by artificial intelligence.
detectResult.human_created: Human Created: This image appears to be authentic or human-created.
detectResult.confidence_score_desc: Confidence Score: Indicates how certain the AI model is about its prediction. Higher scores mean more confidence in the result.
detectResult.ai_generated_desc: AI Generated: The image shows characteristics typical of AI-generated content, such as specific artifacts, patterns, or inconsistencies.
detectResult.human_created_desc: Human Created: The image appears to be photographed, hand-drawn, or created through traditional digital art methods.
detectResult.note: Note: No detection method is 100% accurate. Results should be considered alongside other evidence when making important decisions about image authenticity.

faq.name: faq
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about our AI image detector service.

items.title: How accurate is the AI image detector?
items.description: Our detection system achieves over 95% accuracy in identifying AI-generated images. The technology is continuously trained on millions of image samples from various AI generators.

items.title: What image formats are supported?
items.description: The detection service supports common image formats including JPG, PNG, WebP, and GIF files up to 10MB in size.

items.title: Are my uploaded images stored?
items.description: No, we prioritize your privacy. Uploaded images are processed in real-time and immediately deleted after analysis. We never store or share your content.

items.title: Can it detect images from all AI generators?
items.description: Our detection technology can identify images from most popular AI generators including DALL-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, and many others. We continuously update our models to detect new AI generation techniques.
